page.title: 08Chickney Democracy
page.content: This area is in the parliamentary constituency of Saffron Walden. The present member is Conservative. There are 3 tiers of local government; the representatives are chosen by the people on the electoral roll of their village. The Essex County Council sits at Chelmsford & is responsible for education, roads, police & many of the social services. Uttlesford District Council sits at Saffron Walden and Dunmow. It levies rates on households according to property values. It deals with housing, planning permission for new developments etc. As there are no schoos in this area they have to arrange transport for children living more than 3 miles from Henham, Thaxted & Broxted schools. The parish council deals with local amenities eg footpaths, grass cutting & the maintenance ofpublic places.
